activate_triggered: Attention! Zone [ZONE] is already triggered while trying to activate: [DEVICES]
cancelable_helper: If this option is enabled, delayed alarms will be canceled once the alarm conditions is resolved. Otherwise, if this option is not enabled, the delayed alarm will trigger an alarm after the timeout period, no matter if the alarm condition is still present or not.
delay_activate_helper: Wait given time (in seconds) before activating an alarm zone. eg.  this can be used to leave enough time to leave the house without triggering an alarm
delay_alarm_helper: Does not go into alarm mode immediately after a sensor in this zone is triggered, but delays operation for the given time (in seconds) to allow for safe disarming of the alarm
m_descr: Group multiple security zones. These zones can be activated
tests_helper: Devices that trigger the alarm state
timeout_helper: Timeout (in seconds) to reset alarm mode after the last sensor in this zone was untriggered.
type_helper: Alarm type to be used in events
